general.description:
§lWARNING:
Experimental and work-in-progress, not advised for survival usage!
§lINFORMATION:
This vehicle is meant for testing new features that may be implemented into the rest of IVLabs' productions, without having to rifle through various spare JSONs or fiddling about with developer mode.
This vehicle is neither canon to the loose spiderweb-string that is the IVLabs lore, nor is it an LM. (yet)
